ArrayList<String> listAll = new ArrayList<String>(Arrays.asList("1011","1015","1021","1023","1024","1025","1027","1028","1035","1041","1129","1163","1164","1166","1167","1169","1170","1171","1248","1261","1264","1267","1279","1292","1309","1310","1312","1313","1314","1364","1370","1377","1378","1389","1408","1420","1427","1433","1434","1439","1443","1450","1451","1452","1454","1456","1457","1464","1465","1469","1477","1482","1485","1492","1505","1512","1516","1530","1538","1552","1562","1565","1573","1574","1575","1579","1582","1593","1595","1617","1624","1628","8501"));

73家门店，销售额在1000万之上


ArrayList<String> list1 = new ArrayList<String>(Arrays.asList("1011","1015","1021","1023","1025","1027","1028","1129","1163",
                "1166","1167","1169","1170","1248","1261","1264","1267","1279","1292","1309","1313","1314","1378","1389","1408","1420",
                "1434","1443","1450","1456","1457","1477","1485","1492","1512","1552","1573","1574","1579","1593"));
